features.title: NPC List
features.description: View and manage Non-Player Characters (NPCs) such as managers, referees, and announcers. You can create new NPCs, edit existing ones, and navigate to their profiles.

features.title: NPC Profile
features.description: Detailed view of an NPC, displaying their image, type, biography, and stats. From here, you can generate a custom image using AI.

features.title: Generate NPC Image
features.description: Use the integrated AI tools to generate a unique portrait for your NPC based on their description and type. You can regenerate until you find the perfect look.

features.title: Creating a League
features.description: Commissioners can create new leagues, setting the maximum picks per player and inviting other players.

features.title: The Draft Room
features.description: Players participate in a snake draft to build their rosters. The UI shows the current turn and available wrestlers.

features.title: Match Reporting
features.description: When a league match is booked, players receive a notification to report the results of their matches.

features.title: League Standings
features.description: The league dashboard displays the current standings, including wins, losses, and draws for each wrestler.

features.title: League Rosters
features.description: View the complete rosters for all players in the league.

features.title: League History
features.description: Keep track of all shows and match results that occurred within the league.

features.title: The Beginning
features.description: Your journey starts here. Establish your reputation through backstage encounters and initial matches as you find your footing in All Time Wrestling.

features.title: Tag Team Redemption
features.description: Experience the power of partnership. Find a compatible partner and dominate the tag team division while rebuilding your momentum.

features.title: Betrayal
features.description: Trust is a luxury you can no longer afford. Face the consequences of a broken alliance and seek retribution against your former partner.

features.title: Corporate Power Trip
features.description: The authorities are against you. Survive impossible odds and unfair stipulations as you challenge the corrupt management's control.

features.title: Profile Drawer
features.description: Access your personal settings by clicking the Profile button in the top navigation bar. This opens a dedicated drawer on the right side of the screen, allowing you to manage your account without leaving your current context.

features.title: Tag Teams
features.description: Track formal tag team partnerships. Teams often have their own specific finishing moves and shared history in the Tag Team division.

features.title: Seasons
features.description: Configure and track game seasons. Seasons group shows together and define the journey toward major year-end events.

features.title: Championships
features.description: Manage the various titles across the promotion. From World Championships to regional belts, track current champions and the prestige of each title.

features.title: Factions
features.description: Manage powerful wrestling groups. Factions bring together multiple wrestlers under a single banner, creating complex storylines and alliance-based rivalries.

features.title: Show Calendar
features.description: Plan ahead with the integrated calendar. View upcoming weekly shows and major Premium Live Events at a glance.

features.title: Cards
features.description: The heart of the ATW RPG battle system. Each card represents a move (Strike, Grapple, Aerial, Throw) with specific health and stamina costs and damage effects.

features.title: Wrestler Rankings
features.description: Track the momentum of every wrestler in the promotion. Rankings determine title eligibility and positioning on show cards.

features.title: Decks
features.description: Manage wrestler-specific decks. Strategy involves balancing high-damage finishers with efficient setup moves and stamina-recovering taunts.

features.title: AI Configuration
features.description: Configure the Artificial Intelligence providers used for match narration, image generation, and creative assistance. You can switch between different LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini, LocalAI) and configure their specific settings.

features.title: Injury Management
features.description: Define different types of injuries, their severity, and recovery times. These are used to dynamically affect wrestler performance and availability in the campaign and booking modes.

features.title: Wrestler Profile
features.description: View detailed information about any wrestler, including their core stats (Drive, Resilience, Charisma, Brawl), current alignment (FACE/HEEL), and championship history.

features.title: Match Narration
features.description: Bring your matches to life with AI-generated or manual narration. The Story Director uses match participants, rules, and outcomes to weave a compelling narrative of the action.

features.title: Admin Tools
features.description: Perform critical maintenance tasks such as manual tier recalculation and account management.

features.title: Show Templates
features.description: Define reusable templates for your shows. Set up standard segments, match orders, and branding to quickly book consistent weekly episodes or pay-per-views.

features.title: Wrestler Management
features.description: Manage the entire roster of wrestlers. Add new talent, edit existing stats, assign images, and manage contract details from this centralized view.

features.title: Gang Warfare
features.description: In Gang Warfare, you must navigate the dangerous world of factions. Build alliances or crush rivals as you fight for control of the locker room.

features.title: Fighting Champion
features.description: As the Fighting Champion, you must defend your title against a series of challengers. Each defense increases your prestige but tests your stamina.

features.title: Backstage Actions
features.description: Take daily actions to improve your stats, recover from injuries, or build hype for your next match. Choose wisely, as you have limited time each day.

features.title: Tournament Bracket
features.description: The tournament chapter challenges you to climb the ranks in a single-elimination bracket. Win your matches to advance to the finals and claim the trophy.

features.title: Show Planning
features.description: The Show Planning interface allows you to book matches and segments for an upcoming show. Drag and drop wrestlers to create matches, set stipulations, and define segment types.

features.title: Show History
features.description: View a complete history of all booked shows. Click on any show to view its detailed results, ratings, and match history.
